Halyk Bank's market share by assets has fluctuated throughout 2024:

| Quarter | Market Share by Assets |

- Halyk Bank maintained the **#1 ranking in Kazakhstan** across all quarters in 2024

- By Q4 2024, market share rebounded to 20.94%
